means: 凹，小凹（尤指视网膜的中央凹）
field of view evaluation apparatus 视野测定装置

word_mean: ［拉］〔复foveae〕 〔NA〕凹：结构或器官表面小凹的通称。单独用常指视网膜中央凹

sentence.Network_en: The fovea is the area of maximum visual resolution ( but NOT maximum sensitivity ).
sentence.Network_cn: 黄斑是具有最大视觉清晰度 ( 但不是最大灵敏度 ) 的区域.

sentence.Network_en: Vision is much more acute at the fovea than at other portions of the retina.
sentence.Network_cn: 在视网膜的中央凹的视力比网膜其他部份更敏锐.

sentence.Network_en: The fovea has only cones, and the blind spot or papilla has no receptors.
sentence.Network_cn: 中央凹的部分只有锥细胞, 而盲点或神经乳头部分无视细胞.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: from Latin, literally small pit'

means.word_mean: 1. area consisting of a small depression in the retina containing cones and where vision is most acute

auth_sentence.content: The fovea enables the clarity of vision that people rely on to read, watch TV and drive.
